articles.title: Phillies vs. Cardinals: Corey Knebel survives Alec Bohm's error as Phils win again - NBC Sports
articles.description: "It felt like playoff baseball a little bit, I guess." The Phillies won a game they'd have lost in years past, hanging on during an intense ninth inning and picking each other up. By Jim Salisbury
articles.content:
ST. LOUIS -- How many times have you seen it over the last decade of mostly losing seasons and completely playoff-less baseball?
